attributes.action: Stop 99p and pound shops from selling items for more than £1.
attributes.background: The idea of a 99p shop or pound shop is a good one and increasingly becoming popular on the highstreet. Now though they are selling items for more than a pound with the intention of confusing and driving up profits. False advertising and seeking to mislead the public.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the names of shops.

In any case, false advertising legislation already exists.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
